name: Steel Empire
description: Steel Empire is a steam punk shoot'em up game featuring a frantic combat filled with powerful enemies and insane obstacles. Enjoy a beautiful world and retro game-play as you dodge and shoot your way through classical stages to fight the evil empire!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: Core2Duo 2.6Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GPU with DirectX11 support DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 250 MB available space Sound Card: Sound Card with DirectSound support
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: Core i3 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GPU with DirectX11 support DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 250 MB available space Sound Card: Sound Card with DirectSound support
